profile.name: Bill The Dev
profile.title: Senior Unity Engineer & Technical Artist
profile.quote: Optimization is not just a phase; it is the architecture of immersion.
profile.about: A resilient Senior Unity Specialist and Technical Artist who turned financial challenges into a catalyst for professional excellence. Starting with a 30% Talent Scholarship at FPT University, I pivoted to full-time industry development to support my career, rapidly evolving from a junior developer to a Senior Technical Artist. Currently driving core development for 'Shmackle' (Live on Meta Quest 2/3/3s), I bridge the gap between deep C# architecture and high-fidelity technical art. My journey includes shipping titles at Golden Sea, gaining Enterprise Scrum experience at Gameloft, and pioneering Digital Twins at FPT akaVerse. I specialize in building tools that accelerate production and optimizing complex rendering pipelines for VR/Mobile.
profile.location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam (Open to Remote/Relocation)

portfolio.title: Bill's DevSprint (SaaS)
portfolio.description: A comprehensive Project Management SaaS built for indie devs in 48 hours. Features dynamic wallpaper themes, Google Drive deep-integration, drag-and-drop asset management, and smart labeling. 'From a developer, for developers'.

portfolio.title: Responsive WebGL Template
portfolio.description: The definitive open-source solution for Unity WebGL responsiveness. Solves full-window display issues on mobile/desktop. Features a custom loading bar and easy drop-in installation via .unitypackage.

portfolio.title: Bill Biome Shader
portfolio.description: A complete stylized environment suite featuring Indirect GPU Instancing for massive density, interactive foliage that bends away from players, wind simulation, and a custom in-editor foliage painting tool.

portfolio.title: Animal Push Royale
portfolio.description: Top 6 Vietnam GameVerse 2024 Finalist. Achieved a 300% performance boost by rewriting the threading model and implementing custom vertex-displacement shaders. Features dynamic 3D UI and secure SSO.

portfolio.title: Pro Atlas Baker
portfolio.description: A professional non-destructive texture atlas baking system for Blender. Features session management, automatic UV remapping, and layout optimization to combine multiple textures into a single optimized atlas.

portfolio.title: Bill SSOutline (URP)
portfolio.description: Robust Screen-Space Outline solution for URP using Render Graph. Supports Sobel/Roberts algorithms, occlusion masking (hiding behind water/glass), and selection masks for specific object highlighting.

portfolio.title: MemeCrawler AI
portfolio.description: An AI-powered web scraper that autonomously fetches and categorizes internet memes for content creation workflows. Hosted live with source code available on GitHub.

portfolio.title: Sketchfab Gallery
portfolio.description: A web gallery integrating the Sketchfab API to fetch and display 3D models dynamically. allows users to search and preview assets directly in the browser.

portfolio.title: Food Ping Pong (DragSlice)
portfolio.description: A fast-paced arcade game developed for the Korea-Vietnam Game Contest. Features 'juicy' slicing mechanics, precision touch input handling, and polished physics interactions.

portfolio.title: Scene Switcher Tool
portfolio.description: A Unity Editor extension that streamlines scene management. Allows developers to switch, load, and unload scenes instantly via a visual overlay, reducing friction in large projects.

portfolio.title: Video to Subtitle Converter
portfolio.description: Automated pipeline extracting audio from video, transcribing via OpenAI Whisper, and burning subtitles using FFmpeg. Built with a Flask web interface for easy usage.

portfolio.title: Chatbot Gemini API
portfolio.description: A rich chat application leveraging Google's Gemini API. Supports text messaging, markdown rendering, file uploads, and direct browser audio recording.

portfolio.title: Puffy (GMTK Jam 2024)
portfolio.description: A creative puzzle platformer developed for GMTK Game Jam 2024. Features unique size-changing mechanics ('Scale' theme) and soft-body physics interactions.
